description: Shiv Sena (UBT) president Uddhav Thackeray alleged intimidation and coercion by the ruling alliance in the BMC elections, calling it a "strange" contest for political survival. Despite the Mahayuti alliance's majority, Thackeray asserted the resilience of his party, thanking voters for their support amidst alleged pressure.

Pollution crisis: GRAP-IV reimposed in Delhi-NCR; air quality slips to ‘severe’ category
description: Delhi-NCR's air quality has plunged into the 'severe' category, prompting the Commission for Air Quality Management to reimpose GRAP-IV restrictions. This escalation follows the earlier enforcement of GRAP-III.  Under Stage IV, older vehicles like BS-III petrol and BS-IV diesel models are banned from plying, with exceptions for essential services.  Existing GRAP measures remain in effect.

Steelers nation demands change after Tomlin's steelers exit
description: Steelers Nation has accepted Mike Tomlin's departure after nearly two decades, with a poll showing 64.79% of fans believing it was the right decision. While acknowledging his past success and Super Bowl title, fans expressed frustration with recent playoff disappointments and conservative play-calling. Tomlin is reportedly considering a move to television.

title: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt's heartfelt life update amid team's tough season
description: The Kansas City Chiefs had a pretty disappointing season this time, but the billionaire heiress, Gracie Hunt, has always been there for the team. Amid all the mess, Gracie Hunt has made a wholesome post about her life along with a few inspirational words that has moved fans. With the team's poor performance, many of their players are also getting trolled brutally.

title: Zuckerberg hired Wang for $14bn — now they’re clashing
description: Meta's new structure reveals tension between Mark Zuckerberg and Alexandr Wang, the $14 billion AI recruit. Wang finds Zuckerberg's micromanagement stifling, while staff question his leadership for Meta's AI ambitions. A recent strategy clash highlighted differing priorities, with Wang pushing for cutting-edge AI over immediate product integration.

title: Kevin O’Leary’s warning for US on China: America lacks grid for AI surge; China adds 500 GW
description: Kevin O'Leary, a prominent Canadian investor, voices a concerning warning about the AI surge in America: it's on a collision course with an energy crisis. He points out that while China's energy infrastructure is evolving rapidly—with an impressive addition of 500 gigawatts—the U.S. has shockingly added 'zero.
